checks.finding: Window dimensions shown but opening areas not calculated; casement windows at bedrooms need verification.
Windows 3050P (4'-6" height) and 3040P (3'-6" height) exceed 24" minimum height requirement.
Windows 3050P (2'-8" width) and 2650P (2'-2" width) exceed 20" minimum width requirement.
Window sill heights not specified for sleeping rooms; field verification required.
Plan shows Owners Suite and Suites #2-4 but egress window locations/types not clearly designated per sleeping room.
Riser height shown as 7'-6" (appears to be total rise); individual riser calculation: 90"/15 risers = 6" each (PASS if interpreted correctly, but notation unclear).
Tread depth specified as 11" exceeds 10" minimum requirement.
Stair width not dimensioned on plans; requires verification.
Headroom clearance not shown on stair sections; requires verification.
Handrail height specified as 34" to 38" meets code requirement.
Guard walls and railings shown at second floor landing, loft, and porches where required.
Guard rail height specified as 36" minimum meets code requirement.
Stair detail notes specify 4" max sphere through balusters, meets requirement.
Plans specify duplex receptacles along wall max 12' spacing per code.
Electrical plans specify GFCI protection for all kitchen countertop receptacles.
Plans specify GFCI protection for all bathroom receptacles on both floors.
Plans specify GFCI protection for all 125V receptacles in garage areas.
AFCI protection specified for bedrooms and other required areas including sleeping rooms.
Plans specify smoke detectors in each sleeping room per code requirements.
Plans specify smoke detectors outside each sleeping area and on each story.
Plans specify CO detectors on each level with fuel-burning appliance and outside sleeping areas.
Design wind speed not explicitly stated on plans; Hawthorne, FL location requires verification of applicable wind zone.
Wind exposure category not specified on cover sheet or structural notes.
Plans reference structural engineer's drawings for all structural components but hurricane straps not explicitly detailed in extracted data.
Garage wall sections show 1/2" drywall but fire-rated separation details not explicitly called out.
Doors between garage and dwelling shown on plans but self-closing hardware not specified in door schedule.

checks.description: No openings from garage to bedrooms
checks.finding: Floor plans show garages separated from dwelling but direct adjacency to bedrooms requires field verification.
Wall sections specify 'blown insulation per code' but R-value not explicitly stated; cover sheet notes verify with attached energy calculations.
Wall sections specify 'wall insulation per code' but R-value not stated; 2x6 walls suggest capacity for R-19.
Windows specified as impact-rated but U-factor not provided in window schedule; energy calculations referenced on cover sheet.
